participant_1.background:
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
Football is my main focus, and I need to look my best to be successful.
my boyfriend is unemployed.
i like doing art projects.

participant_2.background:
I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.
My art is a great way to express myself and connect with others.
I've got a laptop to help me keep track of my gardening plans.
I like to wear warm clothes to keep me and my family warm.
I once went on a 10 day silent retreat.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1!
Hi, I'm participant_2!
What are your hobbies?
I like to go paddle boarding and I also enjoy working on art projects.
That's cool! I like to play football and I like to do art projects too.
What kind of art projects do you like to do?
I like to paint and draw. I also like to make sculptures.
That's great! I love to paint and draw too. I also like to make jewelry.
That's awesome! I've never tried to make jewelry before.
It's really easy! You just need some wire and beads.
That sounds like fun! I might have to try that sometime.
You should! It's a great way to express yourself.
It sounds like it. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Allie. She's a golden retriever.
That's so cute! I love golden retrievers. I have a parrot named Todd.
That's cool! I've never had a parrot before.
They're great pets! They're really smart and they can talk.
That sounds amazing! I might have to get one someday.
You should! They're really great pets.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely look into it.
